content.value: public ValueTask<RunSummary> Run(IXunitTestClass testClass, IReadOnlyCollection<IXunitTestCase> testCases, ExplicitOption explicitOption, IMessageBus messageBus, ITestCaseOrderer testCaseOrderer, ExceptionAggregator aggregator, CancellationTokenSource cancellationTokenSource, FixtureMappingManager collectionFixtureMappings)

Public Function Run(testClass As IXunitTestClass, testCases As IReadOnlyCollection(Of IXunitTestCase), explicitOption As ExplicitOption, messageBus As IMessageBus, testCaseOrderer As ITestCaseOrderer, aggregator As ExceptionAggregator, cancellationTokenSource As CancellationTokenSource, collectionFixtureMappings As FixtureMappingManager) As ValueTask(Of RunSummary)

parameters.description: The test class to be run.
The test cases to be run. Cannot be empty.
A flag to indicate how explicit tests should be treated.
The message bus to report run status to.
The test case orderer that will be used to decide how to order the test.
The exception aggregator used to run code and collect exceptions.
The task cancellation token source, used to cancel the test run.
The mapping of collection fixture types to fixtures.

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test class
The test method that contains the test cases. May be null for test cases that do not support classes and methods.
The test cases to be run.
The constructor arguments that will be used to create the test class.

return.description: Returns summary information about the tests that were run.
